body.name: Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth, 5G WiFi 4K HD 20000L Portable Movie Projector with Mini Tripod, Outdoor Projector Home Video Smart Projectors Compatible with iOS/Android/Laptop/TV Stick/HDMI/USB
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 3 hrs 47 mins
features: 🌟【4K HD Resolution】The Hivvtui S8 movie projector delivers vivid, crisp HD images at a 20,000:1 contrast ratio. To make it perfect for watching movies, and TV, displaying photos, and other decorations, the projector includes a 3LCD color calibrated with a 20000L technology display. This projector delivers crisp, clear images while protecting your eyes with a high refractive index 6-layer glass lens and a diffuse eye-protecting light source.

🔆【Multi-Device Connectivity & Hi-Fi Stereo Speakers】Home theater projector with HDMI / USBx2 / 3.5mm headphone jack is compatible with Fire TV Stick, Roku, laptop, USB, computer, headphones, external speakers, iPhone Android, iPad, PS5, etc. Without any external speakers, you can enjoy great stereo sound with the built-in 3W dual stereo speakers with an SRS sound system.

🌟【Ultra-fast 5G WiFi & 5.1 Bluetooth】The S8 mini projector with wifi and Bluetooth function is equipped with an advanced 5G WiFi chip with 5G and 2.4G dual-band WiFi function. It can effectively avoid signal interference to ensure a stable signal and fast transmission for a better online video experience.S8 portable projector supports Bluetooth 5.1 function to easily connect to various Bluetooth speakers and headphones to improve the sound of parties or outdoor entertainment events.

🔆【200 "Giant Screen & Versatile Correction & 60%-100% Zoom & Small Size】: The 4K outdoor projector offers a 30-200 inch projection display with a projection distance of 2.6-14.5 feet, a 4:3/16:9 aspect ratio, a 60-100% zoom, and 4P/4D horizontal and vertical corrections for optimal viewing in home theaters and outdoor movies! Meanwhile, the projector measures 4.9x5.5x6.3 inches, making it very convenient to carry.

🌟【Support Multi-application Installation & Screen Mirroring/Wireless Projection】The S8 WiFi projector has a built-in smart system that supports all kinds of APPs downloading, installing TV/movies and playing online, built-in no ads, and no TV system is needed to connect any device. Connect the projector with iOS / Android devices to use "Screen Mirroring" or "Wireless Projection" to mirror movies, videos, apps, games, and photos from your phone to the big screen at any time.

Does this projector have a built-in speaker? Yes, this projector is built-in stereo speakers, you can hear the video without connecting any device. Does the projector have an autofocus feature? The projector's autofocus technology is not yet mature, in order to ensure that the customer's experience S8 projector using manual focus function. Use "F+" or "F-" key to adjust the sharpness of the screen. Can I play the video directly without connecting my phone? Yes, this projector has a built-in app, you can download it directly, and after downloading it, you can open the app directly to play it if you are connected to Can this projector be used for outdoor movie nights? Yes, this projector is designed to be compact and lightweight, so it is easy for you to carry it around with you or use it outdoors. The projector head projects Can I connect my phone via Bluetooth with this 5G WiFi Bluetooth Projector? Bluetooth can only transmit Audio, but not Videos. If you want to cast your device’s screen, please go to the homepage and use screen mirror function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The projector works great! It’s not big, not heavy. Image is clear. Isn’t noisy at all. Easy set up and disconnect. Definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up. Great picture and sound.
reviews.reviewText: This projector is perfect for inside or outside use. It's easy to set up and the picture is perfect. It's quiet and does not heat up. The built in speakers are good. You can look at apps and watch all major movie apps. I love to use it with my Xbox and play my favorite games. It's also easy to connect my Bluetooth speakers and headsets. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Product for the Price
reviews.reviewText: Has all the key features I need and very easy to use. Only downside is maybe the actual projectors speaker is poor but can be solved pretty easily if hooked up to an external speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm not too tech savvy...
reviews.reviewText: I love this projector! The quality, size and option to have an optional stand (that collapses to act as a pole). The clarity is great and so is the sound. I bought it to use it outdoors, but can think of many ways to use it indoors (not all of our rooms have tvs so this will be perfect for guests! We bought this to project onto the house or garage for the holidays. My trouble is avoiding the "subscriptions" that cost more money. I can't figure out a way to play the download without having to subscribe to a monthly app. I need to spend time trying to figure out this part, because it's a deal breaker if I can't project without having a monthly subscription. I think the manual needs a bit more detail for those of us who don't get along well with technology. Maybe even a video!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very poor quality …
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Do you see a changes in brightness? That's right, there is no changes in brightness. The only thing that can be changed is the focus and size of the image. The sound is very weak... my old Sony Ericsson sounds 5 times better than this projector. About “4k support”… maybe in somebody dreams it’s support 4k, but I made sure that it does not support 4k video. So this projector is just a waste of money and time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good picturea but bug pretty frequently (only used Netflix and Disney Plus)
reviews.reviewText: In general I am happy about the product (I buy it in promotion)The connectivity works well (when we understand that only one sound bluetooth system should be used at the time if you want to change while you are using it then you get 50% chance of no sound and need a reboot)The picture is great (this is my first projector) with Netflix and Disney Plus.I only have some trouble and bugs. Sometimes the projector do not project so it need to be unplug from the electricity and then replug and it worked.So se little point that are annoying but in general it is a good product worth what I paid.Maybe latter system update will solve the bugs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good speaker, good system
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a projector that had the apps already installed and had a good speaker. This one definitely satisfies in those departments. I added a fire stick 4k to make things even better. I've had it for over three months now and have used it in two rooms so it has lasted a good amount of time. The only two things that are a bit annoying are the extra steps to get to the HDMI and that it doesn't have something to adjust the leveling of the device itself. It comes with a tripod but it isn't very adjustable. I just propped it up with a little leverage of a book. Overall though, great value for what you get. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up and the picture is really good for the price I paid...
reviews.reviewText: Five stars I can't complain about anything I only paid $99 dollars for projector...They gave a good discount but I think that will go away soon...I'm lucky I took my time and researched and found this when it's on sale...
